Container.Name: Lights HTTP
Container.Overview:
A production-ready HTTP API server for controlling Govee smart lights with comprehensive monitoring and observability features.
Features: - REST API with Bearer token authentication - Control lights: on/off, RGB colors, color temperature (2000-9000K), brightness - Prometheus metrics endpoint for monitoring - Health check endpoints - Structured JSON logging - Docker containerized
API Server: Port 8080 (requires authentication) Metrics Server: Port 9090 (no authentication required)
Container.DonateText: If you appreciate this app, please consider supporting the developer

Config.Name: API Port
Config.Description: Port for the main API server (requires authentication)

Config.Name: Metrics Port
Config.Description: Port for Prometheus metrics (no authentication required)

Config.Name: Bearer Token
Config.Description: Bearer token for API authentication (required - generate a secure random string)
